## Container.remove() method

delete

Delete an entry from the repository

Signature:

```typescript
remove(key: string): this;
```

Decorators:

`@bind`

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type   | Description |
| --------- | ------ | ----------- |
| key       | string |             |

Returns:

this

## Example

```js
container.remove("my-key");
// Remove container.repository['my-key']
```
